name: World Cup Soccer Star
overview: Can you win the world cup? The ultimate world cup simulation! Play the World Cup, full match arcade section. Every side human or computer controlled. All the thrills of world soccer competition. Extra time and penalty shoot-outs. All results shown in detail. The most versatile & comprehensive game of it's kind. Up to 24 players can take part in a single competition. 100 international teams, including all the current teams competing in the 1994 World Cup. Full editing facility. 2200 international players. Varying weather conditions and pitch type.
